name: Alien Invasion (itch) (Chaitanya Jain, Mohit Verma)
description:
This is a very fun game you should not miss on.

It has different types of Turrets and Aliens, each with unique specialty

Click Here to skip to Download

Technical Information if someone wants for some reason

Currently there are total 6 types of Aliens in the game. There stats are mentioned in the below table.

Specialties of each Alien:

  • Buffed Alien
    • Has 50% chance to convert to Normal Alien when killed
  • Speedster
    • Has 20% chance to carry a Normal Alien
    • Has 10% chance to carry a Buffer Alien (Buffed can convert to Normal)
  • Boss
    • Spawn every 5th wave
  • Mini-Boss
    • When Boss is killed, it splits into 2 Mini-Bosses in the above and below lanes
    • Instantly breaks anything it touches while also killing itself in the process
  • Flying Alien
    • It flies till it reaches any turret after which it lands and can't fly again
    • Cannot be hit while flying

Currently there are 3 types of Turrets in the game. There stats are mentioned in the below table.

Specialties of each Turret Projectile:

  • Bullet - From Normal Turret
    • Damages 1 Alien
  • Bomb - From Bomb Turret
    • Explodes damaging multiple targets
    • Also does half damage to any single alien above or below the exploding area
  • Laser - From Laser Turret
    • Can hit multiple targets in the same row
    • Number of targets it can hit depends upon its Penetration effect
